name: Locked in the mall
description:
Locked in The Mall is a journey into the fantasy world inspired by the nineties. Between the real and the imaginary lies the protagonist, who wakes up in a bathroom of a mall where he has been locked in.

Little by little he will have to inspect the area until he finds the key that will open the main door.

The mall consists of two stores (a video game store and a laundromat) and a bathroom, which incorporate unusual objects.
